text: Windward Mall is an enclosed shopping center located in Kāneohe, Hawaii, anchored by Macy's, and Regal Cinemas. The mall, owned by Kamehameha Schools, was managed by General Growth Properties until 2011 when General Growth Properties and Jones Lang LaSalle entered an agreement to transfer managership to Jones Lang LaSalle.Windward Mall's ownership transferred to Jones Lang LaSalle The mall underwent a significant $23 million renovation in 2006 to improve the interior and add new retail tenants. On April 15, 2019, it was announced that Sears would be closing on April 30, 2019. ==Stores== Windward Mall has over 110 stores. Its anchor stores are Macy's, Eco Wash Hawaii, and Ross Dress for Less. It has a movie theater operated by Regal Cinemas. ==See also== *Ala Moana Center *Kahala Mall ==References== ==External links== *Windward Mall official site Category:Buildings and structures in Honolulu Category:JLL (company) Category:Shopping malls in Hawaii Category:Shopping malls established in 1982 Category:Tourist attractions in Honolulu Category:1982 establishments in Hawaii Category:Commercial properties of Kamehameha Schools
title: Windward Mall
